entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 30 percent chance of snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
